hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.CNPaperWorksDO paperWork where paperWork.cnPaperWorkId IN (select paperpin.cnPaperWorkId FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaperworksPincodeMapDO paperpin where paperpin.pincodeId IN (select pin.pincodeId FROM com.ff.domain.geography.PincodeDO pin where pin.pincode=:pincode AND pin.status='A') )

FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.CNPaperWorksDO paperWork where paperWork.cnPaperWorkId IN (select paperpin.cnPaperWorkId FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaperworksPincodeMapDO paperpin where paperpin.pincodeId IN (select pin.pincodeId FROM com.ff.domain.geography.PincodeDO pin where pin.pincode=:pincode AND pin.status='A') and paperWork.cnPaperWorkName = :paperWorkName )
